entities.name: OFFICE 365
entities.description: A suite of cloud-based services and desktop applications provided by Microsoft, recognized for revenue over the period in which cloud services are provided.

entities.name: LINKEDIN
entities.description: A professional networking service owned by Microsoft, with subscription payments recognized as unearned revenue until services are provided.

entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: A technology company that provides various software and cloud services, including Office 365, LinkedIn, Xbox subscriptions, Windows 10 support, and Dynamics business solutions.

relationships.relationship_description: Office 365 is a key product of Microsoft, with revenue recognized over the period cloud services are provided.
LinkedIn is a professional networking service owned by Microsoft, with subscription payments recognized as unearned revenue until services are provided.
